Package civitas.celestis.util.io

Class Serialization

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.util.io.Serialization
public final class Serialization extends Object
Contains utilities related to the serialization of objects.

      Serializes an object into a string using Object.toString().
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to serialize
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to serialize
      Returns:
      The string representation of the provided object obj

    • serialize

      @Nonnull public static <T extends Serializable> String serialize(@Nonnull T obj, @Nonnull Function<? super T,String> serializer) throws RuntimeException
      Serializes an object into a string using a custom serializer function.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to serialize
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to serialize
      serializer - The serializer function
      Returns:
      The string representation of the provided object obj
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - When an exception occurs during serialization (the invoked exception will be wrapped in a RuntimeException)

    • serializeGroup

      @Nonnull public static <E> String serializeGroup(@Nonnull Group<E> g)
      Serializes a group into a string. This method forcefully copies the components of the provided group into an immutable copy, (which is achieved by Group.copyOf(Group)) then calls Group.toString().

      While this operation guarantees successful serialization, any type-specific data will be lost. For example, serializing a LinearColor using this method will return a different string from directly serializing it using LinearColor.toString().

      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of element the group is holding
      Parameters:
      g - The group to serialize into a string
      Returns:
      The string representation of the provided group g.

    • deserialize

      @Nonnull public static <T extends Serializable> T deserialize(@Nonnull String str, @Nonnull Function<String,? extends T> deserializer) throws IOException
      Deserializes a string into an object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to deserialize
      Parameters:
      str - The string to deserialize
      deserializer - The deserializer function
      Returns:
      The deserialized object
      Throws:
      IOException - When an exception occurs in the process of deserialization (the invoked exception will be wrapped in an IOException)

    • deserializeDoubles

      @Nonnull public static Group<Double> deserializeDoubles(@Nonnull String str) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException
